title: built first computer and my fps is low getting 58 fps
body:
Processor Intel Core 6700k 4Ghz
Graphics NVDIA GeForceGTX 1050 ti 4GB
16GB Ram
1080x1920 56Hz

replies.body:
I'm just a liiiiiiittle bit jealous of that rig since mine recently died {{item:3070}} ....

Onto the matter at hand, it definitely looks like you should be running League pretty smoothly with that setup, so there might be some software issues hiding somewhere. It could be that you're missing a driver update somewhere, or something as simple as closing out unneeded programs in the background. 

Follow our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and you should be able to get to the bottom of this, but hit me back up if not!
